title: Spanking Miss Jones
description: A romantic lunch followed by a sexy spanking session…  Adam Sinclair (the sexy alpha male CEO of Sinclair Consulting) and Jemma Jones (his girl-next-door secretary) plan to celebrate their two week anniversary by having lunch at the Italian restaurant where their romance first started. Afterwards, Adam has a surprise for her: a sensual spanking session in his office.  However, Jemma doesn’t know what to think when her ex-boyfriend walks into the office before lunch…  This is the second story in the Seduced by the Boss series and continues Adam and Jemma’s sexy romance. However, I provide sufficient back story so you can read this as a stand-alone if you wish.  This is a short erotic romance of approximately 4,900 words and contains a hot, passionate and explicit sex scene! For Adults 18+  Here’s what happened in the first sexy romance, Seduced by the Boss 1: Pent-Up Passion  Jemma Jones has been secretly in love with her sexy boss, Adam Sinclair, for the last eighteen months, ever since she started working for him. When he invites her to lunch one day, she’s worried she’s going to be fired. However, Adam has a different proposition in mind. When he seduces her in the office that afternoon, their pent-up passion overtakes them both!
author: Jenn Roseton
